template.name: Zabbix server health
template.description:
This template is designed to monitor internal Zabbix metrics on the local Zabbix server.
Link this template to the local Zabbix server host.
Generated by official Zabbix template tool "Templator" 2.0.0

item.name: Zabbix server: Zabbix stats cluster
item.description: The master item of Zabbix cluster statistics.

item.name: Zabbix server: Connector queue
item.description: The count of values enqueued in the connector queue.

item.name: Zabbix server: Discovery queue
item.description: The count of values enqueued in the discovery queue.

item.name: Zabbix server: LLD queue
item.description: The count of values enqueued in the low-level discovery processing queue.

item.name: Zabbix server: Preprocessing queue
item.description: The count of values enqueued in the preprocessing queue.

item.name: Zabbix server: Utilization of alerter internal processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the alerter processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Zabbix server: Utilization of alerter processes is high
trigger.event_name: Zabbix server: Utilization of alerter processes over 75%

item.name: Zabbix server: Utilization of alert manager internal processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the alert manager processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Zabbix server: Utilization of alert manager processes is high
trigger.event_name: Zabbix server: Utilization of alert manager processes over 75%

item.name: Zabbix server: Zabbix proxies stats
item.description: The master item of Zabbix proxies' statistics.

item.name: Zabbix server: Queue over 10 minutes
item.description: The number of monitored items in the queue, which are delayed at least by 10 minutes.

trigger.name: Zabbix server: More than 100 items having missing data for more than 10 minutes
trigger.description: The `zabbix[stats,{$IP},{$PORT},queue,10m]` item collects data about the number of items that have been missing the data for more than 10 minutes.

item.name: Zabbix server: Queue
item.description: The number of monitored items in the queue, which are delayed at least by 6 seconds.

item.name: Zabbix server: Configuration cache, % used
item.description: The availability statistics of Zabbix configuration cache. The percentage of used data buffer.

trigger.name: Zabbix server: More than 75% used in the configuration cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing `CacheSize` in the `zabbix_server.conf` configuration file.

item.name: Zabbix server: Trend function cache, % of unique requests
item.description: The effectiveness statistics of Zabbix trend function cache. The percentage of cached items calculated from the sum of cached items plus requests. Low percentage most likely means that the cache size can be reduced.

item.name: Zabbix server: Trend function cache, % of misses
item.description: The effectiveness statistics of Zabbix trend function cache. The percentage of cache misses.

item.name: Zabbix server: Value cache, % used
item.description: The availability statistics of Zabbix value cache. The percentage of used data buffer.

trigger.name: Zabbix server: More than 95% used in the value cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing `ValueCacheSize` in the `zabbix_server.conf` configuration file.

item.name: Zabbix server: Value cache hits
item.description: The effectiveness statistics of Zabbix value cache. The number of cache hits (history values taken from the cache).

item.name: Zabbix server: Value cache misses
item.description: The effectiveness statistics of Zabbix value cache. The number of cache misses (history values taken from the database).

item.name: Zabbix server: Value cache operating mode
item.description: The operating mode of the value cache.

trigger.name: Zabbix server: Zabbix value cache working in low memory mode
trigger.description: Once the low memory mode has been switched on, the value cache will remain in this state for 24 hours, even if the problem that triggered this mode is resolved sooner.

item.name: Zabbix server: Version
item.description: A version of Zabbix server.

trigger.expression: last(/Zabbix server health/zabbix[version],#1)<>last(/Zabbix server health/zabbix[version],#2) and length(last(/Zabbix server health/zabbix[version]))>0
trigger.name: Zabbix server: Version has changed
trigger.event_name: Zabbix server: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Zabbix server version has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

item.name: Zabbix server: VMware cache, % used
item.description: The availability statistics of Zabbix vmware cache. The percentage of used data buffer.

trigger.name: Zabbix server: More than 75% used in the vmware cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing `VMwareCacheSize` in the `zabbix_server.conf` configuration file.

item.name: Zabbix server: History write cache, % used
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The percentage of used history buffer. The history cache is used to store item values. A high number indicates performance problems on the database side.

trigger.name: Zabbix server: More than 75% used in the history cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing `HistoryCacheSize` in the `zabbix_server.conf` configuration file.

item.name: Zabbix server: History index cache, % used
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The percentage of used history index buffer. The history index cache is used to index values stored in the history cache.

trigger.name: Zabbix server: More than 75% used in the history index cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing `HistoryIndexCacheSize` in the `zabbix_server.conf` configuration file.

item.name: Zabbix server: Trend write cache, % used
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The percentage of used trend buffer. The trend cache stores the aggregate of all items that have received data for the current hour.

trigger.name: Zabbix server: More than 75% used in the trends cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing `TrendCacheSize` in the `zabbix_server.conf` configuration file.

item.name: Zabbix server: Number of processed numeric (float) values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The number of processed float values.

item.name: Zabbix server: Number of processed log values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The number of processed log values.

item.name: Zabbix server: Number of processed not supported values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The number of times the item processing resulted in an item becoming unsupported or keeping that state.

item.name: Zabbix server: Number of processed character values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The number of processed character/string values.

item.name: Zabbix server: Number of processed text values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The number of processed text values.

item.name: Zabbix server: Number of processed numeric (unsigned) values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The number of processed numeric (unsigned) values.

item.name: Zabbix server: Number of processed values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The total number of values processed by Zabbix server or Zabbix proxy, except unsupported items.

discovery_rule.name: High availability cluster node discovery
discovery_rule.description: LLD rule with item and trigger prototypes for the node discovery.

item_prototype.name: Cluster node [{#NODE.NAME}]: Address
item_prototype.description: The IPv4 address of a node.

item_prototype.name: Cluster node [{#NODE.NAME}]: Last access age
item_prototype.description: The time between the database's `unix_timestamp()` and the last access time.

item_prototype.name: Cluster node [{#NODE.NAME}]: Stats
item_prototype.description: Provides the statistics of a node.

trigger_prototype.name: Cluster node [{#NODE.NAME}]: Status changed
trigger_prototype.description: The state of the node has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

discovery_rule.name: Zabbix proxy discovery
discovery_rule.description: LLD rule with item and trigger prototypes for the proxy discovery.

item_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Certificate
item_prototype.description: The encryption status for connections from a proxy.

item_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Compatibility

trigger_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Zabbix proxy is not supported
trigger_prototype.description: Zabbix proxy version is older than server previous LTS release version or server major version is older than proxy major version.

trigger_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Zabbix proxy is outdated
trigger_prototype.description: Zabbix proxy version is older than server version, but is partially supported. Only data collection and remote execution is available.

item_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Compression
item_prototype.description: The compression status of a proxy.

item_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Host count
item_prototype.description: The number of enabled hosts assigned to a proxy.

item_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Item count
item_prototype.description: The number of enabled items on enabled hosts assigned to a proxy.

item_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Last seen, in seconds
item_prototype.description: The time when a proxy was last seen by a server.

trigger_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Proxy last seen
trigger_prototype.event_name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Zabbix proxy last seen more than {$PROXY.LAST_SEEN.MAX} seconds ago
trigger_prototype.description: Zabbix proxy is not updating the configuration data.

trigger_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Zabbix proxy never seen
trigger_prototype.description: Zabbix proxy is not updating the configuration data.

item_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: PSK
item_prototype.description: The encryption status for connections from a proxy.

item_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Required VPS
item_prototype.description: The required performance of a proxy (the number of values that need to be collected per second).

item_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Stats
item_prototype.description: The statistics for the discovered proxy.

item_prototype.name: Proxy [{#PROXY.NAME}]: Unencrypted
item_prototype.description: The encryption status for connections from a proxy.

macro.description: The maximum number of seconds that Zabbix proxy has not been seen.

value.name: Zabbix server: Zabbix internal process busy %
Zabbix server: Zabbix data gathering process busy %
Zabbix server: Zabbix cache usage, % free

graph.name: Zabbix server: Trend function cache effectiveness
Zabbix server: Zabbix cache usage, % free
Zabbix server: Zabbix data gathering process busy %
Zabbix server: Zabbix internal process busy %
